meanings.sent1: The old clock remained nonprogressive, stuck at the same time for years.
meanings.sent2: Her nonprogressive attitude towards learning hindered her academic growth.
meanings.sent3: The turtle's nonprogressive pace in the race made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The rust on the abandoned car was a nonprogressive reminder of neglect.
meanings.sent5: The nonprogressive nature of the desert landscape seemed frozen in time.

meanings.sent1: The company's nonprogressive policies led to its downfall in the competitive market.
meanings.sent2: His nonprogressive mindset prevented him from adapting to new technologies.
meanings.sent3: The stubborn old dog was quite nonprogressive when it came to trying new treats.
meanings.sent4: The ancient ruins stood as a nonprogressive testament to the passage of time.
meanings.sent5: The nonprogressive culture of the village resisted any modern influences.
